answers.answer: Hi! I'm at 7 weeks, 4 days and...my bbs hurt and are swollen with slightly blue-ish veins;I have nausea on and off throughout the day;pulling and twinges all over my abdomen;major constipation;fatigue;mood swings;some slight cramping (but I'm starting to wonder if that's more from needing to poo..sorry, if TMI)backache;bloating;headacheBut I am reminding myself that I LOVE every single second of it! (Although, I'll be more relaxed after the u/s tomorrow...I'm a nervous wreck right now!):)

I will be 6 weeks tomorrow and I also havepainful boobies  That's my biggest symptomlots of fatigueconstipationpulling twinges mainly on the right side more subtle ones on the leftcrampingand finally nausea in the morningsand painful gasI too love the symptoms and freak out if they are not present

I will be 6 weeks on Sat...Right now I am having:some crampingheadacheshaving to pee a bunch (sorry if tmi)fatiguemorning, noon, and night sicknessIts totally fine if you don't have any symptoms I was like this with my son and he is very healthy and active. But on the other hand with my daughter I was sicker than a dog so it can go either way.

Hi, I am 7 weeks currently and i have many symptoms that come and go.  i may have sore bbs for an hour here then it will subside, then i may get a headache, then it will go away, then i may feel some slight cramping, etc.  yadda yada yada.  :-)  I am never symptom free although there is none that just make me not want to be pregnant.  This is my first successful pregnancy.  (3 previous miscarriages before 5 weeks)And although this is not a pregnancy symptom, It is caused by pregnancy and another member responded to my post about my left butt cheek hurting like crazy (only for the last week).  Someone responded that it may be sciatic pain.  but i want to know if anyone else is experiencing this.
BTW, WHAT IS EVERYONES DUE DATE?I AM FEB 12
dani, i am going to add you to the list of EDD we have going! (feb 12 was my daughters due date, but had to have her 2 weeks early!)I am cramping and alot of nausea...

I am almost 9 weeks and my symptom is that I am alergic to work. LOL. Seriously when I work from home nothing is wrong with me, I come into the office it starts with back pains, then stomach cramps, and most of all at 2.10 I just want to sleep.I have monitored this for the past 5 days and that is my conclusion, other than that I have no symptoms. If I did not have my menstrual like clock work every month I would not have known that I was. Are any of you eating the entire kitchen, maybe its my mind because I have been trying to gain 20 pounds since graduating his school 10 years ago, and I think is my opportunity so I am taking advantage of it.

nelly, eat for two but not excessively.....with my first, my doc was so rude and told me to eat for one......that she only wanted me to gain 25 and that was it. Well, I did great until about 34 weeks and then i started gaining  6 pds a week!!! for 2-3 weeks this happened, thats when they realized i had preeclampsia...so keep an eye on weight gain and swelling!!!(I too have been a scavenger in the kitchen lately!)

I have symptoms off and on...tirednauseatedCRABBY!!! LOLhungeryfood aversionsgassy (ewww hate that one)and I can completely relate... I HATE when my symptoms aren't there... It makes me worry like CRAZY!! LOL!!
I am defintely going to keep that in mind, but I am only 118pounds and 5 8. I think putting on some weight will be great.
as of tomorrow i will be 8wks..my edd is feb 6th....but my symptoms is sore tender breast,frequent peeing,always tired,lower back aches and lower stomach pains,but lil flutters too

I am almost 9 weeks and I have noticed that my emotions are running very high lately. I mean I cried this morning because I could not decide which sneakers to wear. My poor DH! Oh well, he will have to deal with it LOL.  Other than that, the usual symptoms...bloated, constipated, sore bbs. Going for first ultrasound tomorrow! Can't wait!

question: I know some of us are closer to 9 weeks so there has got to be some with major symptoms and some of us are just finding out and have no symptoms at all.
title: Anyone having major symptoms yet?
